alert.note: Alert for Delaware; Lower Bucks; Philadelphia (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Warning issued January 13 at 3:09PM EST until January 13 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Two to three feet of inundation above ground level in low-lying areas near shorelines and tidal waterways. * WHERE...In New Jersey, Mercer, Gloucester, Camden and Northwestern Burlington. In Pennsylvania, Delaware, Philadelphia and Lower Bucks. * WHEN...Until 7 PM EST this evening. * IMPACTS...At this level, flooding may become severe enough to cause some structural damage along with widespread roadway flooding near tidal waterways. Some locations may become isolated by the flood waters. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Widespread moderate to locally major coastal flooding impacts are expected with the afternoon high tide cycle. Some flooding may linger well into this evening near tidal waterways and tributaries due to fresh water runoff. Additional rounds of minor coastal flooding are forecast with the high tides overnight tonight and Sunday afternoon. Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. Delaware River at Burlington MLLW Categories - Minor 9.3 ft, Moderate 10.3 ft, Major 11.3 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 1.6 ft, Moderate 2.6 ft, Major 3.6 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- -------- 13/04 PM 11.6 3.9 3.7 Major 14/04 AM 10.2 2.5 3.6 Minor 14/05 PM 10.1 2.4 2.3 Minor 15/06 AM 8.1 0.4 1.7 None 15/05 PM 9.0 1.3 1.4 None 16/06 AM 8.6 0.9 1.7 None Delaware River at Philadelphia MLLW Categories - Minor 8.2 ft, Moderate 9.2 ft, Major 10.2 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 1.5 ft, Moderate 2.5 ft, Major 3.5 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- -------- 13/03 PM 9.7 3.0 3.3 Moderate 14/03 AM 8.3 1.6 3.0 Minor 14/04 PM 8.3 1.6 2.0 Minor 15/04 AM 6.6 -0.1 1.2 None 15/05 PM 7.5 0.8 1.3 None 16/05 AM 7.0 0.3 1.5 None &&
info.instruction: Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property. If travel is required, do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth.
